item.title: Altair Data Visualization Homework
item.description:
I created my altair theme based on the Economist style guide. I twisted a little bit their color palette and the font style. I used the Google font Noto Sans instead. The following bar chart is what I recreate the first graph based on my theme.

P.S. The font need some time to load. If you refresh the page, you will see the correct font style.
